DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate exercise-base rehabilitation influence circulatory function patient diastolic heart failure ( DHF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Exercise-based Rehabilitation Circulatory Functions Patients With Diastolic Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: A quasi-experimental design use investigation . Eighty DHF patient recruit Chang Gung Medical Foundation , Keelung Branch provide informed consent . These subject randomize trained ( n=40 ) control group ( n=40 ) . The trained subject train bicycle ergometer 60-70 % heart rate reserve 35-55 minute ( include 10-min warm-up , 15-35-min main exercise , 10-min cool-down ) per day , 3 day per week 12 week . The control subject maintain normal living pattern . Subjects ' physical fitness , oxygen transport utilization exercise skeletal muscle , cardiovascular function hemodynamics , blood cell parameter , RBC deformity aggregation , plasma biomarkers myocardial damage , thrombotic factors/reactions measure pre-training stage follow 8th 12th week training program . Experimental result analyze descriptive statistic ( percentage , mean , standard deviation ) , independent t-test , two-way ANOVA , two-way ANCOVA . Previous research mainly focus systolic heart failure , less diastolic heart failure . We study parameter realize physiological response exercise patient discover appropriate exercise intensity prescription .
DOC.criteria: cardiac event optimal medial treatment within 3 month 4 week spar heart disease attack major cardiac procedure . LVEF > 50 % unstable angina pectoris , uncompensated heart failure , myocardial infarction past 4 week , complex ventricular arrhythmia , orthopedic neurological limitation exercise .
